title: Joseph a You Tuber wanted to come to Qatar during the World Cup to meet Dr Zakir Naik & take Shahada
transcript: hello everybody I sincerely give all glory to God for making it possible that we're here today well I am making this video as an appeal to all of you especially those who live in Qatar I have um you know developed a travel plan to be in Qatar for two reasons one of those reasons is uprightly to make my shahada official if you've been following my journey from the very start you would realize how important I place traveling to Malaysia as part of my journey it wasn't something that just came about as a result of my design just to travel because I understand that traveling require huge investments in both accommodation and travel ticket but for the purpose of these of you know know of what is happening in Qatar because when I heard the doctors in Qatar I was quite motivated I have been trumpeting from the very beginning that I would love to have my official Sahara with Amanda had a tremendous impact in my journey it was through watching Dr zakarnak's videos that I came to learn more about Islam over all my videos the most popular videos on my Channel today is a video related to Dr zakarinik and that's the reason why I want to spend the moment with him taking much harder as a gift not just to him but also to me this is a dream that is lurking or they've been lurking in my mind for quite a while now so I beg of you if you're in Qatar or you live in Qatar anywhere I can lay my head you know I only asks you to help me if you can also help me in other ways you know financially or you know help me anyways I urge you to reach up to me via my email handle on the description box I'll be very very happy if you do so thank you so much for listening see you in Qatar
